verses.verse: And the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> in the <S%H7704>country<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H2320>months.<s%>

And the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> for the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H7080>diviners,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> shall we <S%H6213>do<s%> to the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD?<s%> <S%H3045>tell<s%> us <S%H4100>wherewith<s%> we shall <S%H7971>send<s%> it to his <S%H4725>place.<s%>

And they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> ye send <S%H7971>away<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H7971>send<s%> it <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H7387>empty;<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> in any wise <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H7725><s%> him a trespass <S%H817>offering:<s%> <S%H227>then<s%> ye shall be <S%H7495>healed,<s%> and it shall be <S%H3045>known<s%> to you <S%H4100>why<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5493>removed<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> you.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> they, <S%H4100>What<s%> shall be the trespass <S%H817>offering<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> we shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to him? They <S%H559>answered,<s%> <S%H2568>Five<s%> <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H6076>emerods,<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H5909>mice,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4046>plague<s%> was on you <S%H3605>all,<s%> and on your <S%H5633>lords.<s%>

Wherefore ye shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H6754>images<s%> of your <S%H6076>emerods,<s%> and <S%H6754>images<s%> of your <S%H5909>mice<s%> that <S%H7843>mar<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land;<s%> and ye shall <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H3519>glory<s%> unto the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H194>peradventure<s%> he will <S%H7043>lighten<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> from <S%H4480>off<s%> <S%H5921><s%> you, and from <S%H4480>off<s%> <S%H5921><s%> your <S%H430>gods,<s%> and from <S%H4480>off<s%> <S%H5921><s%> your <S%H776>land.<s%>

Wherefore <S%H4100><s%> then do ye <S%H3513>harden<s%> <S%H853><s%> your <S%H3824>hearts,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> and <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H3513>hardened<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H3820>hearts?<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> he had wrought <S%H5953>wonderfully<s%> among them, did they <S%H3808>not<s%> let the people <S%H7971>go,<s%> and they <S%H1980>departed?<s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H5699>cart,<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5763>milch<s%> <S%H6510>kine,<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> there hath <S%H5927>come<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5923>yoke,<s%> and <S%H631>tie<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6510>kine<s%> to the <S%H5699>cart,<s%> and <S%H7725>bring<s%> their <S%H1121>calves<s%> <S%H1004>home<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H310><s%> them:

And <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H5414>lay<s%> it <S%H413>upon<s%> the <S%H5699>cart;<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H3627>jewels<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> ye <S%H7725>return<s%> him for a trespass <S%H817>offering,<s%> in a <S%H712>coffer<s%> by the <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H6654><s%> thereof; and send it <S%H7971>away,<s%> <S%H853><s%> that it may <S%H1980>go.<s%>

And <S%H7200>see,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> it goeth <S%H5927>up<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of his own <S%H1366>coast<s%> to <S%H1053>Beth-shemesh,<s%> then <S%H1931>he<s%> hath <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H853>us<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7451>evil:<s%> but <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H3808>not,<s%> then we shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> it is <S%H3808>not<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> that <S%H5060>smote<s%> us: <S%H1931>it<s%> was a <S%H4745>chance<s%> that <S%H1961>happened<s%> to us.

And the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so;<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5763>milch<s%> <S%H6510>kine,<s%> and <S%H631>tied<s%> them to the <S%H5699>cart,<s%> and shut <S%H3607>up<s%> their <S%H1121>calves<s%> at home: <S%H1004><s%>

And they <S%H7760>laid<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> the <S%H5699>cart,<s%> and the <S%H712>coffer<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> the <S%H5909>mice<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> and the <S%H6754>images<s%> of their <S%H2914>emerods.<s%>

And the <S%H6510>kine<s%> took the <S%H3474>straight<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H1053>Beth-shemesh,<s%> and went <S%H1980>along<s%> <S%H259>the<s%> <S%H4546>highway,<s%> <S%H1600>lowing<s%> as they <S%H1980>went,<s%> and turned not <S%H5493>aside<s%> <S%H3808><s%> to the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> or to the <S%H8040>left;<s%> and the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H1053>Beth-shemesh.<s%>

And they of <S%H1053>Beth-shemesh<s%> were <S%H7114>reaping<s%> their <S%H2406>wheat<s%> <S%H7105>harvest<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley:<s%> and they lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H727>ark,<s%> and <S%H8055>rejoiced<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> it.

And the <S%H5699>cart<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> a <S%H1030>Beth-shemite,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> <S%H8033>where<s%> there was a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H68>stone:<s%> and they <S%H1234>cleaved<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6086>wood<s%> of the <S%H5699>cart,<s%> and <S%H5927>offered<s%> the <S%H6510>kine<s%> a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> took <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and the <S%H712>coffer<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> was <S%H854>with<s%> it, <S%H834>wherein<s%> the <S%H3627>jewels<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> were, and <S%H7760>put<s%> them <S%H413>on<s%> the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H68>stone:<s%> and the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H1053>Beth-shemesh<s%> <S%H5927>offered<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> and <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
And when the <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> had <S%H7200>seen<s%> it, they <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H6138>Ekron<s%> the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H2914>emerods<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> for a trespass <S%H817>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> for <S%H795>Ashdod<s%> <S%H259>one,<s%> for <S%H5804>Gaza<s%> <S%H259>one,<s%> for <S%H831>Askelon<s%> <S%H259>one,<s%> for <S%H1661>Gath<s%> <S%H259>one,<s%> for <S%H6138>Ekron<s%> <S%H259>one;<s%>

And the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H5909>mice,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> belonging to the <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H5633>lords,<s%> both of fenced <S%H4480>cities,<s%> <S%H5892><s%> <S%H4013><s%> and <S%H5704>of<s%> <S%H6521>country<s%> <S%H3724>villages,<s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H1419>great<s%> stone of <S%H59>Abel,<s%> <S%H834>whereon<s%> <S%H5921><s%> they set <S%H5117>down<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> which stone remaineth <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> the <S%H1030>Beth-shemite.<s%>

And he <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H1053>Beth-shemesh,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they had <S%H7200>looked<s%> into the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> even he <S%H5221>smote<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and threescore and <S%H7657>ten<s%> <S%H376>men:<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H56>lamented,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H5221>smitten<s%> many of the <S%H5971>people<s%> with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4347>slaughter.<s%>

And the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H1053>Beth-shemesh<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> is <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God?<s%> and <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H4310>whom<s%> shall he go <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> us?

And they <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H7157>Kirjath-jearim,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> have brought <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> come ye <S%H3381>down,<s%> and fetch it <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H413>to<s%> you.
